name: helper-css-light
description: css classes of help for fronend

scripts.helper: node-sass  --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/helper-css.scss css/helper-css.css
scripts.helper-min: node-sass  --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/helper-css.scss css/helper-css.min.css  --output-style compressed
scripts.helper-bootstrap: node-sass  --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/helper-bootstrap.scss css/helper-bootstrap.css
scripts.helper-bootstrap-min: node-sass  --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/helper-bootstrap.scss css/helper-bootstrap.min.css  --output-style compressed
scripts.dev: npm run vendor & npm run css
